sentences.en: The men have been debriefed by British and Saudi officials.
sentences.cn: 这些人已经被英国和沙特阿拉伯的官员们查问过了。

sentences.en: He obliquely referred to the U.S., Britain and Saudi Arabia.
sentences.cn: 他隐晦提到美国、英国和沙特阿拉伯。

sentences.en: Some 50,000 Nigerian Muslims annually go on the Hajj to Mecca in Saudi Arabia.
sentences.cn: 每年，大概有5万名尼日利亚伊斯兰教徒去沙特阿拉伯的麦加朝圣。
